Package main.java.de.bsi.tsesimulator.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AddingUserFailedException
    If the attempt to add a user to the TSE simulator fails.
    ClientIdAlreadyRegisteredException
    Is thrown when registering a clientId through TSEController#registerClient(String) fails due to the clientId already being registered.
    ClientIdNotRegisteredException
    Thrown when attempting to de-register a clientId from the TSE which is not currently registered.
    ECCException  
    ErrorSignatureCounterOverflow
    This class defines the exception ErrorSignatureCounterOverflow which is thrown if the signature counter in the CryptoCore can not be incremented due to an impending overflow error.
    ErrorTransactionCounterOverflow
    This class defines the exception ErrorTransactionCounterOverflow.
    GracefulShutdownFailedException
    Used when an operation fails during the graceful shutdown, making it less graceful.
    IllegalValueLoadedException
    Thrown when attempting to load a value that is illegal in some way.
    LoadingFailedException
    Is thrown when a failed loading operation causes the TSESimulator to not load successfully.
    ModifyingUserFailedException
    This exception is thrown when modifying user data fails.
    NegativeValueException  
    NoExternalConfigFilesException
    Is thrown whenever the paths passed to the Simulator do not point to the config.properties file.
    NoExternalKeyFilesException
    Is thrown whenever the simulator fails to locate the external key files or fails to read them.
    PersistingFailedException
    Is thrown by the PersistentStorage if there was an error in storing the current values of the TSESimulator.
    RemovingUserFailedException
    If the attempt to remove a user from the TSE simulator fails.
    SignatureCounterException
    Changed the purpose of this exception!
    SigningOperationFailedException
    Is thrown when a signing operation in the CryptoCore fails.
    SimulatorException
    The generic TSE-simulator exception.
    TLVException
    Generic exception for something wrong with TLVs in the simulator.
    TooManyClientsException
    Thrown when registering another client with the TSE would result in a violation of the limit given through maxNumberOfClients.
    TooManyOpenTransactionsException
    Thrown when opening another transactions with the TSE would result in a violation of the limit given through maxNumberOfTransactions.
    TooManyUsersException
    Is thrown when someone attempts to add a user to the simulator but the value Constants.MAX_STORED_USERS has been reached.
    TR_03111_ECC_V2_1_Exception
    This exception is thrown whenever a data conversion operation specified in BSI TR-03111 ECC V2.10 fails.
    UserAlreadyExistsException
    Is thrown when someone attempts to add a user under an ID that is already registered.
    ValueNullException
    Indicates that a value that should be present has not yet been set or has been reset.
    ValueTooBigException
    Indicates that a value in a byte array exceeds the length of what can be encoded with the ASN.1 DER long form of length.
    VerifyingOperationFailedException
    Is thrown whenever a verifying operation in the CryptoCore fails.
